mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: In answer to his letter of Nov. 19 is not competent to judge whether a book on dying [dyeing] which will be six years in preparation and cost $96 or $100 will be justified; possible purchasers are (1) households who weave own material and (2) manufacturing establishments.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1810 December 4, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to William Partridge, n.p.
